props.name: secondaryButton
props.description: Props for the secondary Button component

props.name: bottomMargin
props.description: The bottom margin of the button, or secondary button if passed

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: Whether the buttons get the container's full with

props.name: buttonLayout
props.description: Button layout direction: vertical or horizontal

props.name: duration
props.description: The duration of the button's animations (show/hide)

props.name: withoutAnimation
props.description: Whether to show/hide the button without animation

props.name: testID
props.description: The test id for e2e tests
props.note: Use `testID.button` for the main button or `testID.secondaryButton` for the secondary

sections.title: Usage Examples
sections.description: The floating button can appear when the screen opens or after the user interacts with the screen or specific elements on it.

sections.title: Button Options
sections.description: markdown: The FloatingButton component can include up to two buttons: a main button and a secondary button. The main button can be set to full width using the `fullWidth` prop.

sections.title: Layout
sections.description: markdown: When the `secondaryButton` prop is used, the layout can be configured as either vertical or horizontal. In the vertical layout, the secondary button is styled as a link button, and the main button can span the full width of the container by applying the `fullWidth` prop.
